mean_cn: adj.符合条件的；（尤指婚姻等）合适的，合意的
mean_en: a person who is eligible for something or to do something, is able to have or do it because they have the right qualifications, are the right age, etc.
sentence: Children under 1.2m tall are eligible for free tickets.
sentence_trans: 身高在一米二以下的儿童符合免票条件。
word_etyma: e出 + lig选择，收集 + ible可……的 → 选出来的 → eligible合格的
